Classes in org.bsc.bean used by org.bsc.bean
BeanDescriptorEntity
          BeanDescriptor extension for manage DataBase entity (TABLE,VIEW,STORED) and relations example: BeanDescriptorEntity _entity = new BeanDescriptorEntity(class name); _entity.setEntityName("entity name"); // create join relation _entity.createJoinRelation( "entity in relation", new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldB"), new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldC") ); OR _entity.createJoinRelation( "entity in relation", RIGHT_JOIN, new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldB"), new JoinCondition("fieldA","fieldC") );
BeanEnumeration
          Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
BeanManager
          It's an implementation of DAO interface (see DAO pattern ) for a jdbc data source to define a bean persistent model based on a extension of BeanInfo meta data
Examples:
Connection conn = open connection ...
BeanManagerFactory
          It's a implementation of DAO factory (see DAO pattern ) for create bean manager instances ( DAO interface ) You can extends this class to create a custom version of bean manager
BeanManagerMessages

          Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD

          Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD

          Title: Bartolomeo Sorrentino Classi Description: Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: ITD
JoinType
           
ManagedBeanInfo
          define a bean info that expose the associated bean class property
PrimaryKey
          class for support of composite primary key
PropertyDescriptorField
          PropertyDescriptor extension for manage generic DataBase field PropertyDescriptorField _prop = new PropertyDescriptorField("propName", beanClass, "getpropName", "setpropName"); _prop.setFieldName("field name"); _prop.setSQLType( java.sql.Types.XXXXX );
PropertyDescriptorJoin
          property that identify a field joined with another table field PropertyDescriptorField _propID = new PropertyDescriptorField("propID", ... ); . . .
PropertyDescriptorPK
          property that identify a PrimaryKey field Default data type integer PropertyDescriptorPK _prop = new PropertyDescriptorPK("propName", beanClass, "getpropName", "setpropName"); _prop.setFieldName("field name"); _prop.setSQLType( java.sql.Types.XXXXX );
